snippet.title: Astro Pig | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
🚀 A 90’s nostalgia inspired lo-fi adventure with a relaxing atmosphere and wholesome story, paced between tiny planet platforming and puzzle-solving.

Developed by Garoa Studios 2018-2024.

🚩 Get the game NOW on Steam:
https://bit.ly/astropig 

Follow Garoa Studios on all platforms: https://linktr.ee/garoastudios
